TEXT.TITLE: NORTHERN AIR FREIGHT <NAFI> GETS, REJECTS, BID
TEXT.BODY:
Privately-held <Pilot Air Freight> said it met with officials of Northern Air Freight Inc to try to negotiate a friendly acquisition of Northern, but Northern's management had no interest in the proposal. Northern has annual revenues of about 60 mln dlrs and is based in Seattle.
Reuter
